participant_1.background:
I had to give up my two dogs when I moved, but I'm excited to get a new puppy when I settle in.
I'm five foot nine inches tall, but I don't care because I love my body.
i cuddle up with my dog every night.
I had a party with my friends and we played arm wrestling.
I have two cats, they are my best friends and help me to cope with my mental health.

i don t like music.
I love a good stew, coffee, and creating content for my YouTube channel.
i m a terrible speller.
I collect cat-themed items because they bring me joy and remind me of my favorite animal.

content.text: Hey! I'm excited to meet you!
Hi! I'm excited to meet you too!
I'm doing well! How are you doing?
I'm doing well! I just moved into a new apartment and I'm really excited about it.
That's awesome! I love moving into new places. It's like a fresh start.
It is! I'm just sad I had to give up my two dogs when I moved. But I'm excited to get a new puppy when I settle in.
Aww, I'm sorry you had to give up your dogs. But I'm sure you'll find a great new puppy when you're ready.
Thanks! I'm looking forward to it.
So what do you like to do for fun?
I love to go to the gym, play video games, and watch movies.
That's awesome! I love to go to the gym too. What kind of video games do you like to play?
I like to play all kinds of video games, but I'm really into fighting games right now.
Nice! I'm not very good at video games, but I love watching people play them.
That's cool! I'm always happy to show someone how to play a video game.
Thanks! I'll take you up on that offer sometime.
